title: Bug 123044 - Preview attached file in PDF and the page break in the first item didn't happen
description:
Description: Preview attached file in PDF and the page break in the first item didn't happen.
Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When previewing an attached file in PDF, the page break in the first item does not occur as expected.
EB: Expect the first item in the attached file to have a page break in the PDF preview.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the software
2. Navigate to the attached file
3. Preview the file in PDF format
4. Observe that the page break in the first item is missing
